name: Sid
headerTaglineFour: except I code, not draw circles.

services.title: FullStack Developer @ MSC KIIT (Jan 2022 - Present)
services.description: Led weekly meetings and supervised 10 – 15 Learners and Student Ambassadors and served as Project Lead in 3-4 Projects.

services.title: Technical Executive @ FrontEnd With Benefits (March 2022)
services.description: Organized an offline tech event for the first time, held doubt clearing sessions, solved problems and helped participants to make their first commits.

services.title: Co-Founder and Tech Lead @ KIIT Blockchain Community
Member @ Microsoft Student Community: Learner's Wing (Oct 2021- Jan 2022)
services.description: Built the frontend of a standalone app in the Learner’s Wing repo(JavaScript, BootStrap, React) Re-Designed and built a complete web app with online compiler and user registration.

aboutpara: I'm an electronics student tinkering with the wonders of Web3.
nextline: Learning and building fuel my fire, especially with new tech stacks. When not wrangling circuits, I empower communities through open source. Let's build the future together!
